New Records: The Cavs scored the most points (136) ever in a season opener.
The 136 points are the most the Cavs have ever scored in a non-overtime regular season road game.
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley scored a game-high 25 points.
Caris LeVert led the bench with 19 points.
Pre-Game Insights: Kenny Atkinson texted Caris LeVert about his multifaceted role this upcoming season.
Atkinson wanted to start 2024-25 on a high note.
Post-Match Reflections: Jarrett Allen noted the team's solid defense and offense.
Atkinson praised LeVert for accepting his role.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs' 30-point margin was the second-largest they've ever reached in a season-opening win.
Others: The article does not provide any other significant mentions beyond the match performance.
